attributes.action: ARENS BAR TO CONTINUE RUNNING A LATE BAR UNTIL 2AM FRIDAY & SATURDAY EVENINGS
attributes.additional_details:
ARENS BAR TO CONTINUE RUNNING A LATE BAR UNTIL 2AM FRIDAY & SATURDAY EVENINGS.

We represent the local community that support the new management at the old Woodman now known as the Arens Bar & Restaurant. We want to keep the late bar facility on Friday & Saturday nights as it offers an up upmarket and safe environment for local people to enjoy that is rare in the borough of Hillingdon. The facility is impeccably managed in my experience.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Hillingdon Licensing Service, and not central government.
